entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SLEET WITH SNOW LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW AND SLEET ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

SLEET IN THE MORNING
FREEZING RAIN
PRECIPITATION MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES IN THE MORNING
LIGHT SLEET ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 15

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
